tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    has_mfa BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
);
CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(15) , created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
